Shelly.strategy: Use ranged poke and mobility to avoid her super burst. Force her out of bushes and bait her super early.

Nita.strategy: Zone her and defeat Bruce quickly. Keep distance and break her momentum with splash or crowd control.

Colt.strategy: Flank him with mobility or burst him from cover. Avoid long sightlines and punish reload downtime.

Bull.strategy: Control bushes and chip him down before he closes in. Use knockback or traps to deny his rush potential.

Jessie.strategy: Take out her turret early and overwhelm her range. Bait bounces and play from open lanes.

Brock.strategy: Force him into close fights and disrupt his pacing. Dodge rockets and push aggressively once reloads are low.

Dynamike.strategy: Rush and dodge his throws. Avoid corners and punish lack of vision or escape tools.

Bo.strategy: Break his mines and control the mid-zone. Use poke and mobility to force him off lanes.

Tick.strategy: Dive him early and avoid chip zones. Punish long reload and force him to waste mines.

8-Bit.strategy: Break his damage turret and use speed to outmaneuver him. He’s slow—punish rotations and flank angles.

EMZ.strategy: Rush her before she controls spacing. Bait super and ignore her slow healing over time.

El Primo.strategy: Use knockback, slow, and ranged poke to deny his close-range damage. Stay out of bushes and bait his super.

Barley.strategy: Rush Barley before he sets up zone control. Use gap closers and punish his limited vision and reload.

Poco.strategy: Pressure him early and interrupt his healing rhythm. Destroy grouped pushes and pick off allies first.

Rosa.strategy: Avoid close-range duels and punish her shield phase with chip and zoning. Deny bush control aggressively.

Carl.strategy: Outmaneuver his predictable pickaxe and dodge linear supers. Bait him into walls or unfavorable terrain.

Jacky.strategy: Maintain spacing and zone her from advancing. Use walls to avoid her AoE cone and punish movement cooldown.

Gus.strategy: Interrupt his healing cycles and pet synergy. Punish long animations and chip from safe angles.

Piper.strategy: Close the gap quickly and disrupt her aim. She's lethal at range, but vulnerable to burst and flankers.

Pam.strategy: Burst her before she sets up healing zone. Destroy her turret and isolate her from grouped allies.

Frank.strategy: Interrupt his long wind-up attacks and avoid clustering. Use knockback, poison, or slow to deny supers.

Bibi.strategy: Zone her from approach angles and punish missed swings. Use range or slow mechanics to kite her.

Bea.strategy: Rush her down before her supercharged shot lands. Bait shots and punish her reload downtime.

Nani.strategy: Break line of sight and avoid Peep tracking. Flank her and disrupt her precision with mobility.

Edgar.strategy: Punish his landing and deny healing loops. Space out and control jump zones before he engages.

Mortis.strategy: Zone him out and punish his dash cooldowns. Crowd control and rapid chip damage will neutralize his flanking potential.

Tara.strategy: Deny grouped engagements and punish her card spread from range. Break her shadows and avoid getting pulled near walls.

Gene.strategy: Out-range him and bait his pull. Focus on dodging chip damage and split targets to avoid grouped heals.

Max.strategy: Punish her short range with burst or persistent poison. Control her super zone and dodge her fast-paced aggression.

Mr. P.strategy: Destroy his porter spawn early and avoid clustered damage zones. Use speed and burst to shut him down before he controls mid.

Sprout.strategy: Break map walls and rush him before he creates choke zones. Avoid stacking and bait wall placements early.

Byron.strategy: Interrupt his long-range poke and deny healing chain effects. Punish reload delay and force unfavorable trades.

Squeak.strategy: Push through his splash zones quickly. Dodge sticky blobs and use mobility to neutralize his chip pressure.

Gray.strategy: Interrupt his teleport cycle and bait gadget timing. Stay spread out and punish his long animations and control tools.

Spike.strategy: Punish his slow movement and range limitations. Outmaneuver his area damage and pressure from outside cactus zones.

Crow.strategy: Dodge his jump and poison chip by spreading out. Interrupt his burst and control zones with crowd control or healing.

Leon.strategy: Track his invisibility with vision gadgets. Deny flanks with map awareness and burst him quickly if revealed.

Sandy.strategy: Clear his sandstorm with ranged poke or supers. Stay spread to avoid his splash and control mid-lane.

Meg.strategy: Punish her vulnerable phase and interrupt her transformation. Zone her mech from positioning dominance.

Gale.strategy: Keep distance and punish his short-range cone. Bait knockback and avoid getting caught near walls or portals.

Surge.strategy: Disrupt his upgrade progress early. Pressure him before Stage 3 and deny lane control with range or poison.

Lou.strategy: Avoid frozen zones and chip him from outside his splash radius. Rotate quickly to dodge terrain slowdown.

Ruffs.strategy: Break cover and eliminate his supply chain. Focus on zoning his super and targeting his squishy allies.

Belle.strategy: Control her lane with splash or close-range burst. Watch for marked targets and prioritize gadget dodge.

Buzz.strategy: Avoid stun zones and deny bushes. Bait his super charge and kite him into open terrain.

Ash.strategy: Zone him out and break his rage cycle early. Dodge swarm and punish him post-super cooldown.

Lola.strategy: Pressure her copy range and punish overlapping fire. Bait clone gadget and force her into tight corners.

Fang.strategy: Disrupt his super chain early. Control space and dodge his dash openings with knockback or slow.

Eve.strategy: Destroy hatchlings quickly and use mobility to interrupt her spacing tools. Track her super flight path.

Janet.strategy: Punish her early wind-up and chip her from range. Avoid super splash and bait aerial gadget.

Otis.strategy: Avoid his silence gadget and rotate during splash cycles. Break terrain control and target him before super builds.

Maisie.strategy: Flank her through terrain gaps and bait out her knockback. Pressure her cooldowns before she stuns safely.

Hank.strategy: Rush him before bubble buildup. Use gadgets to deny his splash spread and push him off lane pressure.

Cordelius.strategy: Break his shroom cycle and avoid silence zones. Use mobility and vision to beat his alternate reality setup.

Doug.strategy: Eliminate allies before he engages, and bait his revive timing. Punish cooldowns and split spacing in team fights.

Pearl.strategy: Flank her before heat builds up. Dodge cone blasts and interrupt overheat explosions with quick combos.

Chuck.strategy: Block his dash markers and interrupt chain mobility. Control the field and bait phantom movement.

Mico.strategy: Interrupt his rhythm cycles and control splash distance. Dodge gadget stun and bait tempo super.

Alli.strategy: Clear her pet pathing and keep distance from her burst. Deny tank engagements and rotate quickly around swamp zones.

Rico.strategy: Flank him to avoid his ricochet damage. Use mobility to dodge his shots and punish reload downtime.
